meta.title: Piotr Połcik | Develop the web and have fun!
meta.description: My name is Piotr, and I am a Web developer. Visit my website!

text.paragraph1: I'm Piotr, Master of Computer Science student at Technical University of Denmark and AGH University of Science and Technology in Cracow graduate, where I got my BSc of Engineering diploma.
text.paragraph2: My main focus is Backend developement, with some interest in DevOps, CI/CD and cloud services administration.
text.paragraph3: I'm open to all cooperation proposals, as I love to learn by doing.
